## Documentation Type
- [ ] User Manual
- [ ] Technical Support Guide
- [ ] Architecture Documentation
- [ ] API Documentation
- [ ] Code Comments
- [ ] README
- [ ] Other (specify below)

## Issue Type
- [ ] Missing documentation
- [ ] Incorrect/outdated documentation
- [ ] Unclear/confusing documentation
- [ ] Enhancement to existing documentation
- [ ] New documentation needed

## Location
Where is the documentation issue located?
- **File:** 
- **Section:** 
- **Page/URL:** 

## Current State
**What is currently documented (if anything)?**
Describe or paste the current documentation.

## Problem
**What is wrong or missing?**
Clearly describe the documentation issue.

## Proposed Change
**What should the documentation say?**
Provide the corrected or new documentation content.

### Draft Documentation
```markdown
Paste your proposed documentation here
```

## Audience
Who is the target audience for this documentation?
- [ ] End Users
- [ ] IT Support Staff
- [ ] Developers
- [ ] System Administrators
- [ ] Management

## Additional Context
- Screenshots
- Examples
- Links to related documentation
- References to code

## Priority
- [ ] Critical (Blocking users or causing confusion)
- [ ] High (Important for understanding)
- [ ] Medium (Improvement to clarity)
- [ ] Low (Nice to have)
